Metadata.Description: Your ultimate recipe manager and planner.

Hero.subTitle: Simplify Your Meal Planning
Hero.title:
Plan, organize, and share your culinary creations with ease.
One recipe at a time.

General.title: Why Use Our App?
General.text:
Do you cook home-cooked meals? Do you have many recipes? Can't often decide what to cook?
Our  Lunchefy  app makes meal planning simple and, thanks to its modern design, enjoyable. It is designed for both experienced chefs and amateurs. It offers you the opportunity to not only organize recipes, plan your meals and also share them with others.
Transfer your recipes collected over the years. Then, when you need them, you can find them quickly and easily, both by Name or by the Tags that you can assign to your recipes.
Plan your meals in our built-in calendar so you can prepare what you'll cook in advance and also look back at what you've cooked. Connect with family or friends and share your ideas and plans for the days ahead.

Manager.title: Recipe manager
Manager.description: Your Recipes, Organized and Always Accessible.

Planner.title: Planner
Planner.description: Plan Your Meals, One Day at a Time.

RecipeManager.title: Recipe manager
RecipeManager.text:
No more lost recipes or endless scrolling through notes or bookmarks!  Lunchefy  lets you store and categorize your favorite recipes in one central location.
Assign appropriate tags to recipes such as Dessert, Eggs or Fish, helping you quickly find the perfect dish for any occasion.
With a user-friendly design and seamless navigation, the app is designed to grow with your culinary creativity. Whether it's everyday meals or special occasions.

Planner.title: Planner
Planner.text:
The  Lunchefy  app takes away the eternal question:
„What's for lunch today?“
With our planner, you can easily assign recipes to specific days and create a visual plan for the whole week or month.
If you are planning not only lunch, but also dinner or a dessert for a given day. No problem. You can assign any number of recipes to each day, so there's no limit to your creativity.
By assigning recipes to dates, you can streamline your shopping, reduce food waste and save time in the kitchen.

SharingPlatform.title: Sharing platform
SharingPlatform.text:
Cooking is better when you share it.  Lunchefy  allows you to connect with others and easily share your recipe collection as well as the built-in planner. Whether you're cooking with your family, preparing a meal with a partner or with a group of friends, sharing is seamless and intuitive.
Assigning roles such as Guest or Editor ensures that everyone has the right level of access. Editors can add or edit recipes. While Guests While Guests can browse and enjoy shared content without making changes.
Both groups of users can participate in the planning together. It's up to you with whom you share the responsibility.

Next.title: What’s Cooking?
Next.text:
• Dashboard with statistics
  • Recipe folders
  • Favorite recipes
  • Recipe rankings
  • and more..

Footer.text: Your ultimate recipe manager and planner.
